title: Persian Typographical Error Type Detection using Many-to-Many Deep Neural Networks on Algorithmically-Generated Misspellings. (arXiv:2305.11731v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Digital technologies have led to an influx of text created daily in a variety of languages, styles, and formats.
